titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the twenty one day of December, 1676. Instructions given by His Majesties Privy Council, to the persons appointed by them, to be common tasters of ale and drinking-beer within the city of Edinburgh, and suburbs thereof, Cannon-gate, Leith, and the burghs royal in the shires of Edinburgh, Linlithgow, Haddingtoun, &c.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the twenty one day of December, 1676. Instructions given by His Majesties Privy Council, to the persons appointed by them, to be common tasters of ale and drinking-beer within the city of Edinburgh, and suburbs thereof, Cannon-gate, Leith, and the burghs royal in the shires of Edinburgh, Linlithgow, Haddingtoun, &c.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
